response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $10,000 to you. I am offering it to you at a special price of $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that offers unparalleled value and benefits. I believe this price reflects the exceptional quality and utility of the product while providing you with a significant savings. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 9500}
